entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
